verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son שְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> keep אֲמָרָ֑י <S%H561><s%> my words וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments תִּצְפֹּ֥ן <S%H6845><s%> and lay up אִתָּֽךְ׃ <S%H854><s%> within

שְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> Keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments וֶחְיֵ֑ה <S%H2421><s%> and live וְ֝תוֹרָתִ֗י <S%H8451><s%> and my law כְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <S%H380><s%> as the apple עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> of thine eye

קָשְׁרֵ֥ם <S%H7194><s%> Bind עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H676><s%> them upon thy fingers כָּ֝תְבֵ֗ם <S%H3789><s%> write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on ל֥וּחַ <S%H3871><s%> them upon the table לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> of thine heart

אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Say לַֽ֭חָכְמָה <S%H2451><s%> unto wisdom אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> Thou [art] my sister אָ֑תְּ <S%H859><s%> you וּ֝מֹדָ֗ע <S%H4129><s%> [thy] kinswoman לַבִּינָ֥ה <S%H998><s%> understanding תִקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> and call

לִ֭שְׁמָרְךָ <S%H8104><s%> That they may keep מֵאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> woman זָרָ֑ה <S%H2114><s%> thee from the strange מִ֝נָּכְרִיָּ֗ה <S%H5237><s%> from the stranger אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ <S%H561><s%> with her words הֶחֱלִֽיקָה׃ <S%H2505><s%> [which] flattereth

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> at בְּחַלּ֣וֹן <S%H2474><s%> For at the window בֵּיתִ֑י <S%H1004><s%> of my house בְּעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> through אֶשְׁנַבִּ֣י <S%H822><s%> through my casement נִשְׁקָֽפְתִּי׃ <S%H8259><s%> I looked

וָאֵ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> And beheld בַפְּתָאיִ֗ם <S%H6612><s%> among the simple ones אָ֘בִ֤ינָה <S%H995><s%> I discerned בַבָּנִ֗ים <S%H1121><s%> among the youths נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> a young man חֲסַר־ <S%H2638><s%> void לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of understanding

עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> Passing through בַּ֭שּׁוּק <S%H7784><s%> the street אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> near פִּנָּ֑הּ <S%H6438><s%> her corner וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way בֵּיתָ֣הּ <S%H1004><s%> to her house יִצְעָֽד׃ <S%H6805><s%> and he went
בְּנֶֽשֶׁף־ <S%H5399><s%> In the twilight בְּעֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> day י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In בְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <S%H380><s%> in the black לַ֝֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> night וַאֲפֵלָֽה׃ <S%H653><s%> and dark

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִ֭שָּׁה <S%H802><s%> him a woman לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <S%H7125><s%> And behold there met שִׁ֥ית <S%H7897><s%> [with] the attire ז֝וֹנָ֗ה <S%H2181><s%> of an harlot וּנְצֻ֥רַת <S%H5341><s%> and subtil לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of heart

הֹמִיָּ֣ה <S%H1993><s%> (She [is] loud הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> he וְסֹרָ֑רֶת <S%H5637><s%> and stubborn בְּ֝בֵיתָ֗הּ <S%H1004><s%> not in her house לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁכְּנ֥וּ <S%H7931><s%> abide רַגְלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H7272><s%> her feet

פַּ֤עַם ׀ <S%H6471><s%> Now בַּח֗וּץ <S%H2351><s%> [is she] without פַּ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> now בָּרְחֹב֑וֹת <S%H7339><s%> in the streets וְאֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every פִּנָּ֣ה <S%H6438><s%> corner תֶאֱרֹֽב׃ <S%H693><s%> and lieth in wait

וְהֶחֱזִ֣יקָה <S%H2388><s%> So she caught בּ֭וֹ וְנָ֣שְׁקָה־ <S%H5401><s%> him and kissed לּ֑וֹ הֵעֵ֥זָה <S%H5810><s%> him [and] with an impudent פָ֝נֶ֗יהָ <S%H6440><s%> face וַתֹּ֣אמַר <S%H559><s%> said לֽוֹ׃

זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> offerings שְׁלָמִ֣ים <S%H8002><s%> [I have] peace עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> was due הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> with me this day שִׁלַּ֥מְתִּי <S%H7999><s%> have I payed נְדָרָֽי׃ <S%H5088><s%> my vows

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָצָ֣אתִי <S%H3318><s%> Therefore came I forth לִקְרָאתֶ֑ךָ <S%H7125><s%> to meet לְשַׁחֵ֥ר <S%H7836><s%> thee diligently to seek פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face וָאֶמְצָאֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> and I have found

מַ֭רְבַדִּים <S%H4765><s%> with coverings רָבַ֣דְתִּי <S%H7234><s%> I have decked עַרְשִׂ֑י <S%H6210><s%> my bed חֲ֝טֻב֗וֹת <S%H2405><s%> of tapestry with carved אֵט֥וּן <S%H330><s%> [works] with fine linen מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt
נַ֥פְתִּי <S%H5130><s%> I have perfumed מִשְׁכָּבִ֑י <S%H4904><s%> my bed מֹ֥ר <S%H4753><s%> with myrrh אֲ֝הָלִ֗ים <S%H174><s%> aloes וְקִנָּמֽוֹן׃ <S%H7076><s%> and cinnamon

לְכָ֤ה <S%H1980><s%> Come נִרְוֶ֣ה <S%H7301><s%> let us take our fill דֹ֭דִים <S%H1730><s%> of love עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> until the morning נִ֝תְעַלְּסָ֗ה <S%H5965><s%> let us solace בָּאֳהָבִֽים׃ <S%H159><s%> ourselves with loves

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> for הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> For the goodman בְּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> [is] not at home הָ֝לַ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> he is gone בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <S%H7350><s%> a long

צְֽרוֹר־ <S%H6872><s%> a bag הַ֭כֶּסֶף <S%H3701><s%> of money לָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> He hath taken בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> with him לְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> at the day הַ֝כֵּ֗סֶא <S%H3677><s%> appointed יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> [and] will come בֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> home

הִ֭טַּתּוּ <S%H5186><s%> she caused him to yield בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> With her much לִקְחָ֑הּ <S%H3948><s%> fair speech בְּחֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> with the flattering שְׂ֝פָתֶ֗יהָ <S%H8193><s%> of her lips תַּדִּיחֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5080><s%> she forced

ה֤וֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> He goeth אַחֲרֶ֗יהָ <S%H310><s%> after פִּ֫תְאֹ֥ם <S%H6597><s%> her straightway כְּ֭שׁוֹר <S%H7794><s%> as an ox אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to טָ֣בַח <S%H2874><s%> to the slaughter יָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> goeth וּ֝כְעֶ֗כֶס <S%H5914><s%> of the stocks אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מוּסַ֥ר <S%H4148><s%> to the correction אֱוִֽיל׃ <S%H191><s%> or as a fool

עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> Until יְפַלַּ֪ח <S%H6398><s%> strike חֵ֡ץ <S%H2671><s%> Till a dart כְּֽבֵד֗וֹ <S%H3516><s%> through his liver כְּמַהֵ֣ר <S%H4116><s%> hasteth צִפּ֣וֹר <S%H6833><s%> as a bird אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּ֑ח <S%H6341><s%> to the snare וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָ֝דַ֗ע <S%H3045><s%> and knoweth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it בְנַפְשׁ֥וֹ <S%H5315><s%> not that it [is] for his life הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he פ

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בָ֭נִים <S%H1121><s%> unto me now therefore O ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken לִ֑י וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> and attend לְאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> to the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֵ֣שְׂטְ <S%H7847><s%> decline אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her דְּרָכֶ֣יהָ <S%H1870><s%> to her ways לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> Let not thine heart אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּ֝תַע <S%H8582><s%> go not astray בִּנְתִיבוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5410><s%> in her paths

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For רַבִּ֣ים <S%H7227><s%> many חֲלָלִ֣ים <S%H2491><s%> wounded הִפִּ֑ילָה <S%H5307><s%> For she hath cast down וַ֝עֲצֻמִ֗ים <S%H6099><s%> yea many strong כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> are all הֲרֻגֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H2026><s%> [men] have been slain

דַּרְכֵ֣י <S%H1870><s%> [is] the way שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> to hell בֵּיתָ֑הּ <S%H1004><s%> Her house יֹ֝רְד֗וֹת <S%H3381><s%> going down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חַדְרֵי־ <S%H2315><s%> to the chambers מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death פ
